title: Do the Math with Chris Gibbs
description: Chris Gibbs is not only the owner and operator of Union Los Angeles, but has been a crucial voice and leader within the streetwear community for many years now. We’re lucky enough to call him a homie, and want to use our platform to share his wisdom. Chris is dialing in to discuss staying focused, optimism, building community, being a Black small business owner, streetwear gentrification, cancel culture, voting with your wallet and much more.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
